text: San Diego Chargers receiver Vincent Jackson was arrested on suspicion of drunk driving on Tuesday morning, five days before a key NFL playoff game. Police apprehended Jackson at about 2:30 a.m. and booked him for the misdemeanour before his release, making for a long night with a playoff looming on Sunday at Pittsburgh against the Steelers Jackson enjoyed the best of his four NFL seasons in 2008 with 59 catches for 1,098 yards and seven touchdowns. "We 're aware of the off-the-field issue involving Vincent, '' Chargers general manager A.J. Butler said in a statement. "Obviously we 're disappointed. We take these issues very seriously. Moving forward, we will monitor the situation. ''
title: Chargers receiver arrested for DUI.
